snippet: Provocative advertisements showing a photograph of Hitler with a former Arab leader started appearing on Philadelphia transit buses on Wednesday.
abstract: Provocative advertisements from pro-Israel American Freedom Defense Initiative, showing a photograph of Hitler with a former Arab leader, begin appearing on Philadelphia transit buses.
lead_paragraph: Provocative advertisements showing a photograph of Hitler with a former Arab leader started appearing on Philadelphia transit buses on Wednesday.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Ads With Adolf Hitler Appear on Buses
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Ads With Hitler Appear on Buses
